title: Leah Remini announces divorce from Angelo Pagan after 21 years of marriage - India Today
text: Actor Leah Remini announces divorce from Angelo Pagan after 21 years of marriage Actors Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan recently announced that they have decided to file for divorce after being married for the past two decades. The statement was shared on X. Listen to Story In Short - Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan announced divorce after 28 years of togetherness - They shared the news in a joint statement on X - The couple were married for 21 years Actors Leah Remini and Angelo Pagan have decided to call it quits after being together for 28 years. The couple were married for 21 years. Leah shared a statement on X about the same. Sharing that they would continue to be friends, the actor wrote in a post, "Well, here we are. After 28 years together and 21 years of marriage, we have decided to file for divorce. This decision came after a lot of thought and care, and as hard as divorce is, we are approaching this with a positive outlook because we know it’s what’s best for us. We are proud of how we have worked through this together. Yes, we’re sad, and we’ve got some figuring out to do as we continue to move forward into our new normal—together still in many ways, and apart in some new ones." Read Leah's post here: "But here’s the thing: we’ve been best friends for so many years. We are still celebrating holidays together, watching our favorite tv shows together, and gathering as a family," she added. Leah also disclosed the reason they decided to part ways after staying together for so many years. "To put it simply, we both changed, as people do, and we got used to playing roles that didn’t fit us anymore. After a lot of effort and consideration, we’ve decided to take this step, which reflects who we are today. Our bond is still strong—it’s just evolved into something different," Leah concluded. The couple share a 20-year-old daughter, Sofia. The news of Leah's divorce comes days after Leah's close friend and [singer-actor Jennifer Lopez](https://www.indiatoday.in/movies/hollywood/story/jennifer-lopez-ben-affleck-file-for-divorce-2nd-wedding-anniversary-2585448-2024-08-21) filed for divorce from Hollywood star Ben Affleck.
